title: Expression parser
description: Parse cucumber expression strings into AST nodes. Handle: parameter types ({int}, {float}, {string}, {word}, {}), optional text (cucumber(s)), alternation (cucumber/gherkin), literal text, and escaping.

title: Expression matching and parameter extraction
description: Implement Expression::match_() that runs compiled regex against step text, extracts matched groups, and returns typed Param values with their ParamType. Return None on no match.

title: Expression AST types
description: Define the AST node types for parsed cucumber expressions: Literal, Parameter, Optional, Alternation, Text. Use algebraic data types. Include Location for error reporting.

title: Project scaffolding: moon.mod.json, moon.pkg.json, README
description: Initialize the MoonBit project structure: moon.mod.json with name moonrockz/cucumber-expressions, moon.pkg.json with dependencies, initial README.md, .gitignore, and CLAUDE.md with project conventions matching the gherkin project style.

title: Expression to regex compiler
description: Compile parsed cucumber expression AST into equivalent regex pattern. Map parameter types to their regex patterns. Handle optional groups, alternation, and literal escaping.

title: Cucumber Expressions test suite compliance
description: Port the official cucumber-expressions test suite (from the cucumber/cucumber-expressions repo) to MoonBit. Ensure spec compliance for all expression syntax variants.

title: Documentation and examples
description: Write README.mbt.md with API examples for all expression types, parameter types, custom types, and the registry. Follow the documentation style of moonrockz/gherkin.

title: Custom parameter type support
description: Allow users to register custom parameter types with name, regex, and transform function. E.g. {color} matching red|blue|green. Integrate with the registry and expression compiler.

title: Built-in parameter types and registry
description: Implement ParamType enum (Int, Float, String_, Word, Anonymous, Custom), ParamTypeRegistry with register() and default(). Default registry pre-registers {int}, {float}, {string}, {word}, {}.
